Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres, Norman Burton
Writer: Sheldon Lettich (story), Sheldon Lettich (screenplay), Christopher Cosby (screenplay), Mel Friedman (screenplay)
Title: Bloodsport
Plot: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.
